title: MAG 180 - Moving On Transcript-converted
text:
in here. 
[Annabelle opens the door; the piano music becomes clear and 
close; there is a ticking antique clock sometimes audible] 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 180 – Moving On 
25 
ANNABELLE (CONT’D) 
Your guests are here, Mikaele. 
[Piano playing pauses] 
MIKAELE 
Hoo-hoo-hoo! Excellent! Come in, come in! Ah, a pleasure to meet both of you. 
Thank you Annabelle. 
ANNABELLE 
You’re quite welcome. 
[Piano playing resumes] 
ANNABELLE (CONT’D) 
Have fun. 
ARCHIVIST 
(Extremely tired) Sorry, Mikaele... Salesa? 
MIKAELE 
The one and only. I must say I’ve been, uh... 
[The Archivist and Martin collapse with a small sigh, fast asleep] 
[Piano playing stops] 
(Disappointed umm from Mikaela) 
(Beat) 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 180 – Moving On 
26 
ANNABELLE 
I did say this might happen. 
MIKAELE 
You did, you did. Well. So much for my big reveal. 
Shame. Ah, well, we can talk after they’ve slept, I suppose. Eugh. And had a 
bath. And some food. No rush. 
[Mikaele picks up a teacup] 
MIKAELE (CONT’D) 
We have all the time in the world. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS 
The Magnus Archives is a podcast distributed by Rusty Quill and licensed under 
a Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial ShareAlike 4.0 International 
licence. Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims, produced by Lowri Ann 
Davies, and directed by Alexander J Newall. It featured: Jonathan Sims as The 
Archivist, Alexander J Newall as Martin Blackwood, Chioma Nwalioba as 
Annabelle Cane, and Ray Chong Nee as Mikaele Salesa. To subscribe, buy 
merchandise, or join our Patreon, visit rustyquill.com. Rate and review us 
online, tweet us at TheRustyQuill, visit us on Facebook, or email us via 
mail@rustyquill.com. Join our community on the Discord via the website, or on 
Reddit, at r/TheMagnusArchives. Thanks for listening.
